ygData.subject: Re: Handmade backpacks
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Where do you find handmade backpacks?  Or more to the point, how do you MAKE them?  After spending a ridiculoud amount of time and money searching for the
ygData.messageBody:
>I do wish they made them all stackable! I have been on a long quest for
>handmade backpacks because of that... need all 70 slots in my locker to hold
>words. (one slot for the book)

Where do you find handmade backpacks? Or more to the point, how do you
MAKE them? After spending a ridiculoud amount of time and money searching
for the answer and experimenting with combinations that don't work, neither
I nor any guild member have been able to figure out how to tailor a
Backpack. If I read into your message correctly, the tailored backpacks
have 10 slots instead of the standard 8? That answers the long-asked
question of why backpack patterns are more expensive than backpacks.

I realize this is a bit off-topic, but I have seen mention of handmade
backpacks NOWHERE else. And no one else seems to have a clue.

Thanks
chpicker
